message: Let's split the money evenly to be fair.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60-40 is still a good deal for you.
Bob, the value of your potential gains decreases with each round. I offered a fair split in round one, now I need a bit more to reflect the changing situation.
I'll compromise, I'll take 58% and you can have 42%. It's better for both of us to end this now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Every round you lose a significant portion of your potential gain.  Accept this offer, or I'm taking the majority in the next round.
